newFeatures.title: Event based within X days (relative)
newFeatures.plan: Shopify & Salla: Free / Pro / GURU · Selfserve: Starter / Growth / Enterprise
newFeatures.description:
As a Gameball client
I want to define actions that customers must complete multiple times within a specific time range
So that I can create challenges such as “Buy 7 Super Size Coffees within 14 days” or similar time-based goals.

capabilities.title: Key Capabilities
items:
1. New Time-Bound Action Requirement

  • Clients can configure actions that must be completed X times within Y days/weeks/months.

  • Example:

    • Action: Purchase “Super Size Coffee”

    • Required Count: 7 times

    • Time Range: 14 days

2. Availability Across Modules

The new time-bound condition must be available in:

  • Reward Campaigns - Action Based

3. UI/UX Requirements

  • A new configuration block appears when “Action Count” is selected:

    • Number of times: input field (integer)

    • Time range:

      • Dropdown with:

        • Number of days (custom integer)

        • Number of weeks

        • Number of months

  • Clear helper text example displayed:

    “Customer must complete this action 7 times within 14 days.”

4. Tracking Logic

The system must:

  • Track each occurrence of the selected action per customer

  • Track them according to the defined time window

  • Automatically reset the window when:

    • The time expires, or

    • The customer completes the required count

5. Handling Partial Completion

If the customer does not complete the required number of actions within the time range:

  • The attempt expires and customer can try again

  • Tracking restarts when the customer performs the action again

  • If the campaign's repeatability is set to 1 customers can keep trying till they achieve the campaign, once achieved they cannot achieve it again

6. Edge Cases

  • If the time window is changed in a live campaign, new logic applies only going forward.

  • If the customer completes multiple qualifying actions in a single order/event, each is counted individually.

  • Time range must support:

    • Rolling (dynamic based on first action)
